summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FanPass ticket marketplace. Backend API fully functional with 100% test success rate. Frontend core functionality working with minor filter UI issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Event type filters (concert/match) appear to show mixed results in some test scenarios, but dropdown filtering via 'All Types' selector and quick filter buttons work correctly

design_issues.issue: Some concert events may not show proper concert venue layout with STAGE element

passed_tests: Database seeded with 15 events (7 matches + 8 concerts)
Event filtering by type and city working
Homepage loads with featured events showing both concerts and matches
Event details page loads with interactive venue map
Match venue maps show football stadium layout with pitch and categories
Ticket selection and order summary functionality working
Purchase button enabled when ticket selected
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI filter refinement needed - investigate concert filter display consistency and ensure all concert events show proper venue map with STAGE element
